item.title: How to Be an Empathetic Leader: Strategies for Effective Leadership
item.description: Empathy is a critical skill for any leader who wants to build a successful and sustainable organization. It enables leaders to connect with their employees on a personal level, understand their needs and concerns, and create a positive work environment that fosters engagement and productivity. In this article, we’ll explore some practical strategies for becoming a more empathetic leader. In the Marine Corps I was always taught to know your Marines.
